keyword: calories in a large sweet tea mcdonalds
title: Calories in a Large McDonald's Sweet Tea
meta_description: Discover calories in a large sweet tea McDonalds, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, sugars, and sodium for this 32 oz serving.
h1: Calories in a Large McDonald's Sweet Tea
assumptions: McDonald's standard large sweet iced tea (32 fl oz), brewed black tea with sugar, no additional flavors or add-ins.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, and serving size; values based on McDonald's official data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A large McDonald's sweet tea contains 160 calories, primarily from 41 g of sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a large sweet tea McDonalds?
faqs.a: Approximately 160 calories for the 32 fl oz serving.

faqs.q: What's the sugar content in McDonald's large sweet tea?
faqs.a: About 41 g of sugars, all from added cane sugar.

faqs.q: Does McDonald's large sweet tea have caffeine?
faqs.a: Yes, around 63 mg of caffeine from black tea.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a large McDonald's sweet tea?
faqs.a: 41 g of carbs, with 0 g fiber and all as sugars.

faqs.q: How does medium sweet tea compare to large at McDonald's?
faqs.a: Medium (22 fl oz) has about 110 calories, scaled down from large.
